Stop using the styleManager property in a constructor.
Cache inheriting styles. Also made static arrays in StyleManagerImpl per-instance.

Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Fix RTE when getting overrides from a merged style declaration.
Merge 3.x module leak fix that didn’t make it into the trunk.
Don’t update the applicationDomain property when we choose a child applicationDomain. Put the results in temporary variable so the applicationDomain property is left for the user.
Create an array if one does not already exist. This fixes a null pointer RTE when creating a merged array of properties.
